body: Hello, does Butterly works also with newer versions of OpenFOAM (I downloaded the 1706) or only with 1612? Can't manage to make work the example file 02_0_indoor_airflow. The installations were ok and I run Rhino, Oracle VM VirtualBox with default running, and OpenFOAM as administrator. But I get the error you can see from the creenshot. Thank you in advance. Francesco [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/IfeNwnO9e1us6uJR8rioFgZdjSBuBcwnnkX-fcJ0MaFNIUXbfacNSrPq7qI9VDgWr9VMf4vOnxAYYx*pUj9fVCo7rJvGnOs2/1.jpg)
